table.name: vtiger_thirdparties
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vtiger_thirdparties` ( `thirdpartiesid` int(19) NOT NULL, `thirdpartiesname` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `accounts` int(10) DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`thirdpartiesid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8

table.name: vtiger_thirdpartiescf
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vtiger_thirdpartiescf` ( `thirdpartiesid` int(19) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`thirdpartiesid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8
